fed to the infant. No spices should be added to it, however, a little oil can be added. By the time the child is one year-old, he/she should be eating semi-solid food from the family kitchen.  Top milk can also be given. Milk should be 
boiled and fed with a clean cup and spoon. Leftover milk should NOT be given 
to the infant. Feeding with a bottle is also not advisable as the bottle may not be properly cleaned. Water should not be added to the milk. 
✱  Cleanliness during cooking, before feeding and after cleaning the infant’s stools is to be maintained.
